tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thank you so much Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan Sir and Friendly staff and very kind in taking care of Patients.

I had the privilege of being under the care of Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan, an exceptional diabetic doctor, and it is with great pleasure that I share my experience. Bring down my HBA1c levels from 11.2 to 6.2 which is really incredible.

One aspect that truly impressed me was Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan's commitment to a holistic approach to diabetes management. They not only addressed my medical needs but also emphasized the importance of lifestyle modifications, including diet and exercise.

Their comprehensive guidance helped me make significant positive changes in my daily routine, leading to improved blood glucose control and overall well-being.

If you're searching for a diabetic doctor who combines expertise, compassion, and a holistic approach to care, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Balaji Jaganmohan. They are a beacon of hope for anyone seeking comprehensive and personalized diabetes management. With them by your side, you'll undoubtedly be on the path to better health and a brighter future.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ****** *** *** ****** *** ******* ** ******* **** **** ******** *** ********* **** **** ***** **** **** *** **** ******** ***** *** ****** *** ** ***** **** *********** **** ** **** ****** *** **** ******** ***** ******* 

You won't meet the doctor directly, someone will sit with you and talk to you in length about the negative side effects of diabetes to your body* ** *** **** *** ***** ** **** ** ******* *** **** ** ** ******* *** ***** *** ** ****** *** ** *** ********* 

In my case, I visited the doctor in May 2019, with HBA1C level of 6.9 after reducing it from 7.9 in 3 months. I went there just to get an expert's opinion. In spite of me telling him repeatedly that I would like to normalize sugar levels using diet and exercise first, as that's how I reduced the previous levels, he kept on insisting to start with low dosages of medications. 

I told them NO *** ******* ** ********* ** ***** ****** ** ******** ******** ************ ******* *** ******** **** ******* *** ********** ******* *** ******* **** ** ** ***** 

The reason I am writing the review now is, the hospital and also their call center keeps calling me every month for the last 1 year, in spite of me telling them not to harass me to take tests ** * ** ****** ***** *** ******* 

I am writing here hoping they would stop contacting me by phone, emailing and sms. This is literally harassment for the mistake of visiting them once. *** ******* *** ****** ** **** ** *** ******** ** ****** *** *** ** *********

review: *** ** *** **** ******* *** *** ********* ** *********He listens to our problems and diagnosis very well.Prescribes right medicine.and dosage.Hence Iâ€™m feeling very comfortable with his treatment for the past seven years and having healthy and happy life.The staff at the clinic is also very friendly and takes care of the patients.From the bottom of my heart,I thank the doctor and other staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** ****** **** **** *********** ** ** **** ****** 
He has exceptional Leadership Skills.. 
He is straight to the point and also explains both the direct effects and indirect effects of all the medications.. 
When I first met him, my hba1c status was 9.6..
After meeting this Doctor, he brought my hba1c to 6 and sugar levels got substantially improved.. 
Thanks a lot Doctor for giving me a new Life! 
Arun Kumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I had booked the appointment for my mother, the doctor was very friendly and patient, he explained to her in detail and also took time to talk to me over a call. She was very satisfied with the appointment and also came back with a positive feeling. She has started the treatment and already we see a reduction in blood sugar levels. Would definitely recommend for anyone with Diabetes.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Firstly waiting time more than 2 hours from appointment slot. Secondly, I request Doctor to see patient and understand the issues and then advise whether to continue same medicines / go for blood tests Not just ask Nurse to advise and ask to do all the tests and come. 
Without even seeing patient and writing all blood tests in small slip and take 750rs consultation. And asking if need to enter in file, another 100 rs extra. which is very pathetic and totally unfair.
 I didn't expect from a familiar apollo clinic.

Very patient and to the point. Explains the report in detail and suggests best practices. I visited in Apollo clinic, even supporting staff was very helpful in noting down required details from medical report.
The doctor was friendly, patient and absolutely amazing, will definitely recommend, satisfying experience

review:
Good team of staff & others..... Extremely good  
Recommended for all 
Treatment is good

Very nice doctor friendly nature gave valuable suggestions with wonderful medication in order to bring down HbA1c level

Very gentle and soft spoken Listens to what we have to say and guides accordingly. 
Has responded to our queries and provided support /guidance during our emergencies .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent. Amiable and friendly doctor. I recommend him to other patients. He turned around my disease from insulin to tablets. He prescribed Invokana which was a boon to control disease. I wish doctor all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy as my fasting was crossing 180 and random 260 so I was distributed and I met Dr and he has done investigation and given me ***** medicine and now within a week my fasting came to 112 from 180 . this was amazing *** ** ** ***** *** *** **** ********* ***** ** ** ********** ** ** ******** .thank you Dr .
